original_title: Civimech marks 40th anniversary at forefront of Sri Lanka’s air conditioning industry
original_body_lines: Founded in 1982 under the leadership of the Late Deshamanya Ravindra Soysa – Founder Chairman and Managing Director and Durga Soysa – Director, Civimech Ltd., has achieved many milestones to become one of the leading air conditioning companies in Sri Lanka today. The company recently celebrated its 40th anniversary with pride. Over the past four decades, the company has catapulted to the forefront of the HVAC trade, earning a reputation for excellent customer care and expert after sales service. The company specialises in the supply, installation, and maintenance of high-quality air conditioning equipment.

Over the four decades, the company has built a wide portfolio of reputed clients from different sectors who rely on Civimech to take care of their air conditioning requirements and continues to work with Civimech, secure in the knowledge that they are the best in the HVAC business in Sri Lanka. Some of the key clients who have relied on Civimech includes MAS Holdings, Omega Line Group, Kandy City Center, Passport Office at Battaramulla, Port Administration Building at Hambantota and Institute of Bankers building in Narahenpita.

Efficient maintenance of air conditioning systems is vital for the smooth functioning of businesses and Civimech ensures that its technical staff is skilled to undertake major repairs for Central and Domestic Air Conditioning System, VRV Systems and any kind of trouble shooting across the country.

Commenting on the occasion, Civimech Managing Director Dhanusha Soysa says, “We are proud to mark the 40th anniversary of our operations in Sri Lanka! It gives me a deep sense of pride to know that Civimech has become synonymous with trustworthiness and reliability by catering to the needs of our clients in a timely manner. I would like to thank our partners and customers for their unstinted support and assure them of our continuous best-in-the-industry service at all times.” He goes on to say, “We believe that quality and social responsibilities towards our employees, clients and environment plays a vital role in our continuous success and as a result we are certified with ISO 9001:2015 (Quality Management), EMS 14001:2015 (Environmental Management) and OHSAS 45001:2018 (Health & Safety) – and strictly adhere to those standards.”
